channel.title: Members on Pittsburgh Curling Club
channel.description: Recent content in Members on Pittsburgh Curling Club

item.title: Registration
item.description: Register for the Spring/Summer 2021 Session This session will start on April 19th, 2021 and ends on August 29, 2021. Members can participate in the number of draws that their selected plan provides. Any unused draws expire after August 29, 2021. The Pittsburgh Curling Club COVID-19 protocols remain in place for the 2021 Spring/Summer session. It is our intent to continue to operate safely under these guidelines until the pandemic abates.

item.title: Scheduling
item.description: Scheduling Contact scheduling with questions regarding the 2020/21 curling season at our new facility in Stowe Township. scheduling@pittsburghcurlingclub.com

item.title: Members
item.description: Current Draws Draw times and Draw-masters Spring/Summer, Session beginning April 19th and ending August 29th 2021. Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Time 3:30pm - 5:30pm Format Open Draw Drawmaster Karyn Drombosky - Time 6pm-8pm 7pm-9pm 7pm-9pm 7pm-9pm 4pm-6pm Format Doubles Open Draw Open Draw Open Draw Open Draw Drawmaster Sean Mizerski Ryan Waskiewicz Mark Robinson Burt Cubison Steve Buffington These are initial draw offerings, additional draws and times may be added as demand develops.
